thread.title: В Волгоградской области разработана новая импортозамещающая сельхозмашина.
thread.title_full: В Волгоградской области разработана новая импортозамещающая сельхозмашина. // Advis.ru

posts.author: advis.ru
posts.title: В Волгоградской области разработана новая импортозамещающая сельхозмашина.
posts.text:
Опытный образец самоходного опрыскивателя изготовлен на Волгоградском электромеханическом заводе. Создание такой продукции — первый опыт предприятия по производству сельхозмашин, но не единственная инновационная разработка. Ранее, в 2016 году, на этой площадке впервые в регионе освоили выпуск мобильных модульных скотобоен для перерабатывающей промышленности.
Как пояснили в комитете промышленности и торговли, преимуществами самоходных опрыскивателей являются ширина захвата до 20 метров, рабочая скорость 25 км/ч, хороший обзор и защита персонала от вредных веществ. Конструкция машины позволяет работать на любых культурах, с любым междурядьем, при различной высоте растений.
На сегодняшний день в производстве сельскохозяйственной техники заняты около 20 средних и малых предприятий Волгоградской области. В частности, "Югжелдормаш" и "Нью Тон" планомерно наращивают производство прицепной сельхозтехники, предприятием "Завод дождевальных машин" освоено производство оросительных систем барабанного типа, на ООО "Завод Самоходных машин" налажено производство гусеничных сельскохозяйственных тракторов.
Создание новых и модернизация действующих производств с привлечением инвестиций и средств господдержки — приоритет долгосрочной стратегии развития Волгоградской области, который был обозначен губернатором Андреем Бочаровым три года назад. За этот период 23 предприятия Волгоградской области и три вуза в общей сложности получили 8,9 миллиарда рублей господдержки. В регионе введено в эксплуатацию 25 новых предприятий и крупных производственных участков на действующих площадках, создано почти три тысячи рабочих мест.
В настоящее время в Волгоградской области уже 45 промышленных организаций выпускают 60 видов импортозамещающей продукции. В январе-июне 2017 года ее объем превысил 24,1 миллиарда рублей, что на 18,7% больше, чем за аналогичный период прошлого года. Всего с начала 2015 года, когда в России стартовала программа импортозамещения, волгоградские предприятия произвели такой продукции на сумму 109,8 миллиарда рублей.

Tax income was approximately SEK 12 billion higher than calculated, mainly due to higher... London, Swedish central government payments resulted in a surplus of SEK 6.7 billion in October. The Debt Office's forecast was a deficit of SEK 5.8 billion. The difference is explained by higher tax income. Tax income was approximately SEK 12 billion higher than calculated, mainly due to higher supplementary tax payments. The Debt Office's net lending to government agencies was in line with the October forecast. Interest payments on central government debt were SEK 0.5 billion lower than calculated. posts.title: بصیرت افزایی دانش آموزان راهکاری مهم برای خنثی سازی توطئه های دشمنان
posts.text: بصیرت افزایی دانش آموزان راهکاری مهم برای خنثی سازی توطئه های دشمنان ملایر- ایرنا - فرمانده سپاه ناحیه ملایر گفت: بصیرت افزایی و دشمن شناسی دانش آموزان در این مقطع حساس راهکاری مهم برای خنثی سازی توطئه های دشمنان است. به گزارش ایرنا سرهنگ داود ابراهیمی روز سه شنبه در یادواره 96 شهید دانش آموز ملایر در کانون شهید مدرس این شهر با اشاره به فرموده های رهبر معظم انقلاب در دیدار با دانش آموزان و دانشجویان بیان کرد: طبق بیانات رهبری انقلاب دانش آموزان و دانشجویان نسلی هستند که این کشور را به اوج خواهند رساند و می توانند بر ترفندهای دشمن فائق آیند.وی شرط کسب این پیروزی و رسیدن به اقتدار را دشمن شناسی توسط نسل جوان امروز دانست و افزود: طبق تاکیدات رهبر معظم انقلاب نسل جوان امروز باید علاوه بر تحصیل، معنویت خود را تقویت کرده و علم، بینش، دشمن شناسی و بصیرت خود را افزایش دهد.وی با بیان اینکه 36 هزار دانش آموز جان خود را برای حفظ اسلام و انقلاب فدا کردند، خطاب به آنان تاکید کرد: به طور قطع نقشه های شوم دشمنان با درس خواندن، ولایت پذیری، بصیرت داشتن و دشمن شناسی شما نقش بر آب خواهد شد.فرمانده سپاه ناحیه ملایر برگزاری یادواره های شهدا را فرصتی برای بازخوانی اهداف و آرمان های آنان و پیروی از سیره و روش سیدالشهدا(ع) و شهیدان دانست.سرهنگ ابراهیمی با اشاره به اینکه امروز به برکت جمهوری اسلامی، کشور ایران در اوج عزت و اقتدار است افزود: استکبار جهانی در منطقه و جهان از اقتدار ایران احساس خطر کرده و در هراس است.وی با اشاره به برخی جنایت های آمریکا و استکبار جهانی در قبل و بعد از انقلاب علیه نظام مقدس جمهوری اسلامی خاطرنشان کرد: در عرصه کنونی همه آحاد مردم، مسئولان و نسل جوان باید هوشیار و بیدار باشند، چراکه غفلت از دشمن می تواند لطمه های جبران ناپذیری را به ما وارد کند.سرهنگ ابراهیمی افزود: امروز آمریکا شکست واقعی را خورده و به دنبال این شکست می خواهد بین ملت ایران و نظام شکاف و اختلاف ایجاد کند.وی بر لزوم حفظ وحدت بین مردم و مسئولان برای جلوگیری از ایجاد تفرقه دشمنان تاکید کرد و گفت: ولایت فقیه، سپاه و بسیج، نیروهای انقلابی، ولایت مدار، شجاع و شهادت طلب از عناصر اقتدار کشور هستند.رئیس اداره آموزش و پرورش ملایر نیز بیان کرد: دشمن امروز به دنبال از بین بردن باورهای اعتقادی نسل جوان است و جهت گیری آنان در این دشمنی تغییر کرده است.کاوه برخورداری گفت: دشمن دیروز شهرهای میهن اسلامی ما را مورد هدف قرار داده بود، اما امروز اعتقادات جوانان را مورد هدف قرار داده که وظیفه نسل جوان کسب بینش و دانش برای خنثی کردن نقشه دشمنان است.وی با تاکید بر اینکه دانش آموزان باید نگهبان خوبی برای باورهای دینی، اعتقادی و فکری خود باشند، افزود: والدین و مربیان شما بهترین افرادی هستند که می توانند برای مصون نگه داشتن شما از آسیب های اجتماعی به شما کمک کنند.شهرستان ملایر یک هزارو 100 شهید والامقام را تقدیم انقلاب کرده است.این شهرستان با دارا بودن جمعیتی بالغ بر 300 هزار نفر در 75 کیلومتری شهر همدان واقع شده است.7528/2087خبرنگار: معصومه موسوی**انتشار دهنده: زهرا پیرنیا انتهای پیام /*

posts.author: 吴月心 山东中医药大学附属医院 医师
posts.text:
病情分析：
 您好，癫痫是一种常见精神疾病，经治疗控制病情后，可以上学的。
 指导意见：
 平时生活中要注意，不要过饱过饥，尽量不要饮酒、咖啡、可乐等有神经兴奋作用的饮品。规律作息，避免精神刺激。规律服用药物。

thread.title: Getting off the pill and delayed period
thread.title_full: Getting off the pill and delayed period - Trying To Conceive | Forums | What to Expect

posts.author: BreVogan
posts.text: I stopped taking birth control pills on 9/3 after 7 years with no period. I had one day of spotting that week but I didn’t get my 1st period until 10/8 which lasted 6 days. I ovulated on 10/21 and had a tiny bit of spotting that morning. AF was due yesterday, I’m 16DPO and still getting BFN’s. I did get a FL on Clearblue yesterday with FMU and felt nauseous today but who knows....my body is still adjusting.

posts.author: hoatdongdauthau
posts.title: Lớp học an toàn nồi hơi theo Nghị định số 44/2016/NĐ-CP tại Hải Dương
posts.text:
VIỆN QUẢN LÝ ĐÀO TẠO ESC VIỆT NAM 
                                                                        THÔNG BÁO 
                  ( V/v: Mở các lớp huấn luyện  An toàn cần lao, vệ sinh lao động ) 
– cứ theo Luật an toàn cần lao ngày 25/06/2016 
– Căn cứ theo Nghị định số 37/2016/NĐ-CP quy định chi tiết thi hành một số điều của Luật An toàn, vệ sinh lao động về bảo hiểm tai nạn lao động, bệnh nghề nép. 
– cứ theo Nghị định số 39/2016/NĐ-CP quy định chi tiết thi hành một số điều của Luật An toàn, vệ sinh cần lao có hiệu lực từ 1/7/2016 
– Căn cứ theo Nghị định số 44/2016/NĐ-CP quy định chi tiết một số điều của Luật an toàn, vệ sinh cần lao về hoạt động kiểm định kỹ thuật an toàn cần lao, huấn luyện an toàn, vệ sinh lao động và quan trắc môi trường cần lao 
I. Đối tượng tham gia khóa học an toàn lao động: 
–  Nhóm 1:  Người quản lý đảm nhiệm công tác an toàn, vệ sinh lao động 
–  Nhóm 2:  Người làm mướn tác an toàn, vệ sinh lao động 
–  Nhóm 3:  Người lao động làm công việc có đề nghị nghiêm ngặt về an toàn, vệ sinh cần lao là người làm công việc thuộc danh mục công việc có yêu cầu nghiêm nhặt về an toàn, vệ sinh lao động do Bộ lao động – Thương binh và từng lớp ban hành. 
–  Nhóm 4:  Người lao động không thuộc các nhóm theo quy định tại các khoản 1, 2, 3, 5 Điều này, bao gồm cả người học nghề, tập nghề, thử việc để làm việc cho người dùng lao động. 
–  Nhóm 5:  Người làm mướn tác y tế 
–  Nhóm 6:  An toàn, vệ sinh viên theo quy định tại điều luật 74 Luật an toàn, vệ sinh lao động. 
II. Nội dung khóa học huấn luyện an toàn lao động, vệ sinh cần lao:  dựa trên điều 18, điều 19 và điều 20 Nghị định số 44/2016/NĐ-CP. 
thời kì huấn luyện an toàn lao động theo quy định cho nhóm 1 và 4 tối thiểu 16 giờ; nhóm 2 tối thiểu 48 giờ. Với nhóm 3, thời gian huấn luyện tối thiểu là 24 giờ. Đặc biệt, nghị định số 44 có quy định thời kì huấn luyện tối thiểu với nhóm 5 và 6 lần lượt là 56 giờ và 4 giờ. 
III. Chứng chỉ, chứng nhận: 
Học viên dự khóa học thông qua sát hạch, thẩm tra sẽ được cấp: 
– chứng nhận an toàn lao động với nhóm 1, 2, 5, 6 (kì hạn 2 năm); 
– Thẻ an toàn với nhóm 3 (hạn vận 2 năm); 
– Chứng chỉ chứng thực chuyên môn về y tế lao động (hạn vận 5 năm); 
– Sổ theo dõi người thuộc nhóm 4 được huấn luyện. 
Để công tác tổ chức khóa học được chu đáo, kính đề nghị Các đơn vị, doanh nghiệp, cá nhân chủ nghĩa 
có nhu cầu vui lòng đăng ký trực tiếp bằng Điện thoại, Email, Fax hoặc Công văn về Viện. 
 VIỆN QUẢN LÝ ĐÀO TẠO ESC VIỆT NAM

thread.section_title: Observador
thread.title: Centro Hospitalar rejeita falta de investimentos como causa do surto
thread.title_full: Centro Hospitalar rejeita falta de investimentos como causa do surto

posts.author: Observador
posts.title: Centro Hospitalar rejeita falta de investimentos como causa do surto
posts.text:
A administração do Centro Hospitalar de Lisboa Ocidental rejeitou qualquer relação entre o surto de infeção com ‘legionela’ no hospital São Francisco Xavier, que causou dois mortos, e a capacidade de financiamento e investimentos existente na unidade.
“O Conselho de Administração do Centro Hospitalar de Lisboa Ocidental esclarece que mantém um contrato de concessão de exploração da unidade de cogeração para fornecimento de energia térmica ao hospital São Francisco Xavier com uma empresa especializada e certificada”, refere, num comunicado enviado à agência Lusa. A administração salienta que o contrato estabelece a “responsabilidade da empresa e as condições em que essa deve ser executada”.
“Incluiu toda a manutenção preventiva e corretiva, bem como quaisquer outros encargos que resultem necessários ao bom funcionamento dessa unidade”, refere, vincando que “não existe, pois, nenhuma relação entre a situação ocorrida e a capacidade de financiamento e investimentos no Centro Hospitalar de Lisboa Ocidental EPE”.
O surto de infeção com a bactéria ‘legionela’ no hospital São Francisco Xavier provocou dois mortos, um homem de 77 anos e uma mulher de 70 anos, anunciou a Direção-Geral da Saúde. Em conferência de imprensa, a diretora-geral da Saúde, Graça Freitas, adiantou que a mulher estava internada na unidade de cuidados intensivos do Hospital de Santa Maria, em Lisboa, e o homem nos cuidados intensivos de uma unidade de saúde privada.
O balanço das pessoas infetadas com a bactéria ‘legionela’ subiu para 29, encontrando-se 26 internados, três dos quais nos cuidados intensivos do Hospital São Francisco Xavier, onde foi detetada a infeção.
Graça Freitas disse que o Instituto Nacional de Saúde Ricardo Jorge está a realizar análises, que vão demorar tempo a produzir resultados para detetar a origem do surto, admitindo a responsável que poderá estar nas torres de refrigeração ou no sistema de águas do hospital.
O ministro da Saúde deu duas semanas à Direção-Geral de Saúde e ao Instituto Nacional de Saúde Dr. Ricardo Jorge (INSA) para que “habilitem o governo com um relatório detalhado, que seja do conhecimento público”, para apurar a forma como as coisas correram.

thread.section_title: Všeobecná diskuse o hře - World of Tanks official forum
thread.title: Sila RNG a nevybalancovane bitky podla WN
thread.title_full: Sila RNG a nevybalancovane bitky podla WN - Všeobecná diskuse o hře - World of Tanks official forum

posts.text:
VijaCZ, on 06 November 2017 - 11:04 PM, said:
Za mě je RNG jedna z mála věcí která ještě funguje správně, ve který se ještě nevrtali. Nemuselo by to bejt nutně tak velký číslo, 10 nebo 15 procent by podle mě bohatě stačilo, ale současnej stav mi nevadí a naopak často přináší kuriozní a zajímavý situace - někdy pobaví, někdy naštve. Za mě RNG neměnit.
Naprosto jiná je situace u tzv. turbo-proher a turbo-výher. Tady se podle mě krutě podepsaly tři věci - úpravy hry tanků a hlavně map pro málo schopné hráče, obrovské zvýšení počtu zásobníkových tanků a všechno dorazil prokletý 3-5-7 matchmaker díky kterýmu nafasuješ tři dobrý / špatný / kempící / neopatrný hráče na top tierech a pak dá o hodně víc práce a snahy s hrou něco udělat, protože v naprostý většině bitev budeš ten nejnižší tier ve hře a tanky o dva tiery vyšší se zastavujou bokem docela neochotně aby se trpělivě nechaly ustřílet
Skill matchmaker na který narážíš URČITĚ NE! Ranked Battles myslím dostatečně důkladně ukázaly jaká je to hrůza pokud by se realizoval ve smyslu nějakých lig nebo úrovní, a myslím si že pokud by se realizoval systém " na každou stranu stejnej počet dobrejch a špatnejch" tak by to věci stejně nepomohlo a stejně by si hráči stěžovali dál a možná ještě víc "že jim to zase nefunguje"
Starej naprosto náhodnej a nebalancovanej matchmaker z verze 9.17 byl podle mě nejlepší a nejzábavnější, hry byly pestřejší a dost map se hrálo různě podle různý skladby týmů.
Na WG ovlivňování RNG v podstatě nevěřím, nejvejš občas zahlásím nebo si pomyslím
"no jó artynář toho netrefíš ani kdybys mu to dělo strčil do...cože zase vedle??? artyny maj prostě WG ochranu..ale už sakra jak sem moh artynu dingnout Jasný ovlivňování, WG chrání artyny!!!"
"Samozřejmě, týpek je rudej že sotva umís tankem popojet takže ho prostě neprobiješ a netrefíš a neprobiješ a netrefíš, jasný ovlivňování, WG chrání rajčátka!!!"
"Tyvole jaktože mě ten Lowe stojící na otevřený pláni spotnul? To pako tam snad vozí bino a maskovačku! A nikdo po něm samozřejmě nestřílí ! Jasný ovlivňování - WG chrání platící hráče !!!"
Prostě jedna blbost větší než druhá, všechno je to nesmysl, ale snad každej si někdy pomyslel že "tenhle má takový štěstí že nad ním WG snad musí držet ochrannou ruku"
Dobře - zkuste mi napsat kde se na ovlivňování RNG dá vydělat, když tu každej stěžovatel píše jak strašně mu RNG hází klacky pod nohy - kde jde vydělat na tom že budu ovlivňovat hru v neprospěch průměrných hráčů a tím je naštvu a od hry odeženu, kde jde vydělat na odrazování a vyhánění platících zákazníků. Najděte princip kde z toho WG rejžuje peníze a pak to začnu brát vážně. Starý a pravdivý heslo zní - NAJDI KDE JSOU V TOM PENÍZE A DOZVÍŠ SE PROČ SE TO DĚJE - najděte peníze prosím

posts.author: 青素藤贝
posts.title: 这61国已与中国“配对”成功，成为中国首批CRS交-
posts.text:
1.全球已有102个国家承诺实施最迟将在2018年9月实现CRS下第一次金融账户信息交换。也就是说目前为止全球有102个CRS参与国。
2.全球已有113个国家和地区加入《多边税收征管公约》，包括15个非主权独立税收管辖区（例如泽西岛、开曼群岛等）。
3. 全球已有95个国家和地区签署CRS《多边主管当局间协议》（MCAA）。
4. 根据经合组织公布的官方数据，中国目前已经与61个国家在MCAA下"配对”成功。
最新数据显示，全球已有102个国家承诺实施并最迟将在2018年9月实现CRS下第一次金融账户信息交换。但这个承诺还只是国与国之间税收居民的账户信息自动交换的第一步。
要完成信息交换，还要求该国已经加入《多边税收征管公约》并签署自愿遵守以"多边税收征管互助公约"为基础的框架协议,也就是MCAA，按照该协议规定,一旦提交后续通知,签署国之间的双边信息交换就将生效。
目前中国已经完成了全部以上步骤，并已经在MCAA下实现配对。据经合组织公布的官方数据显示，中国目前已经与61个国家和地区在MCAA下“配对”成功，信息自动交换关系正式被“激活”。
提交配对的资料包括
1.确定本国的CRS法规已经准备就绪，并选择是单边交换还是双边交换；
2. 有关本国数据传输的加密方式说明；
3. 数据保护以及保密性措施说明和确认；
4. 愿意与之进行信息交换的CRS MCAA签署国名单。
61个国家和地区名单中没有香港/澳门和瑞士
届时，中国税务部门将会收到来自以下61个国家和地区的中国税务居民的金融账户信息。
安圭拉；阿根廷；澳大利亚；比利时；伯利兹；百慕大；巴西；英属维尔京群岛；保加利亚；加拿大；开曼群岛；哥伦比亚；哥斯达黎加；克罗地亚；塞浦路斯；捷克；丹麦；爱沙尼亚；法罗群岛；芬兰；法国；德国；直布罗陀；希腊；格陵兰；根西岛；匈牙利；冰岛；印度；印度尼西亚；爱尔兰；马恩岛；意大利；日本；泽西岛；韩国；拉脱维亚；列支敦士登；立陶宛；卢森堡；马来西亚；马耳他；毛里求斯；墨西哥；蒙特塞拉特；荷兰；新西兰；挪威；波兰；葡萄牙；罗马尼亚；圣卢西亚；圣文森特和格林纳丁斯；萨摩亚；斯洛伐克；斯洛文尼亚；南非；西班牙；瑞典；特克斯和凯科斯群岛；乌拉圭。
值得注意的是，已经将中国纳入CRS信息交换意向国的瑞士、以及在此前已经公布要与中欧大陆交换信息的中国香港、中国澳门都不在这份名单中。
香港/澳门/瑞士为什么不在名单中
OECD为国与国之间的信息交换提供了三种“配对方式”，双边模式、多边模式、欧盟模式。香港和澳门采取的是双边“配对”模式。也就是说香港政府会与其他参与国逐一单独签署针对CRS信息交换的双边《主管当局间协议》。而这次公布的名单是MCAA下的多边“配对”模式配对名单。
香港、澳门之所以采取的双边“配对”模式，根本原因是多边征管公约只对主权国家开放，因此香港和澳门不能独立签署该公约。尽管依据《香港基本法》第一百五十三条规定：“中华人民共和国缔结的国际协议，中央人民政府可根据香港特别行政区的情况和需要，在征询香港特别行政区政府的意见后，决定是否适用于香港特别行政区。”
但是，根据国家税务总局2016年2月发布的《关于《多边税收征管互助公约》生效执行公告的解读》第五条的解释，似乎中国在签署公约时其实已经按照《香港基本法》中的规定征询过香港和澳门政府意见，最后的结论是公约暂不适用于香港和澳门。
不过，OECD税务中心主任帕斯卡尔在今年6月26日的视频会议上透露，香港和澳门已经表达了他们加入多边模式的兴趣，同时将在今年10月适用中国中央政府签署的多边征管公约。
至于瑞士不在名单中，也不足为奇，因为这个国家一直对涉税信息交换极其排斥。瑞士既不是欧盟国家，不遵循欧盟模式，也没有加入双边模式和多边模式。只在2011年9月，与德国、英国、奥地利等几个与自己有紧密政治和经济关系的欧洲国家签订了双边性的“魔方协定”，协定主动提交客户金融信息。还有就是在2013年与美国签订了关于实施FATCA的政府间协议。
不过随着全球税收透明时代的到来，“配对”成功国家名单还在不断更新，预计不久之后，还是会有更多的国家加入到与中国信息交换的国家名单中来。
“配对”成功意味着什么
从这份包括61个国家和地区的“配对”名单中，我们可以看出很多发达经济体和诸如英属维尔京群岛、开曼，百慕大这样的全球“离岸避税地”和“洗钱中心”，都名列其中。
也就是说，中国将在明年9月与该61个国家实现金融账户涉税信息的自动交换，在这些地区有金融账户涉税问题的国内高净值客户将最先迎来比较大的冲击。
若你属于以下两种情况，那么CRS或许会跟你有关
1.你是A国的税务居民（学签、工签、永居、公民都有可能是），但你在中国有金融账户，那中国的金融机构就要向A国税务局汇报你的账户信息。
2.你是中国税务居民，但在A国有金融账户，那么A国金融机构就要向中国税务局汇报你的账户信息。
但CRS申报不是世界末日，也不意味着一定会交更多税。CRS的目的只是为了让拥有国际收入的人不要逃税。如果有国际收入的人，在获得收入的时候正常交了税，那么后面就算查完结局也是“没事，你可以走了”。
CRS实行以后对高资产人士有何影响
首先，需要强调的是只有上面说到的两类投资者需要引起注意，人和账户在同一个国家肯定是没事的。
对符合CRS交换条件的高资产人士，主要有以下影响
第一，CRS是世界反避税制度的又一杀手锏。在CRS的新形势下，离岸金融工具也将作为信息而被申报。想通过离岸金融来达到隐藏资产、逃税、避税，将逐渐变得不可能。
第二，CRS生效之后，对于高资产人士而言，如果信息不正确披露或没有披露，不但资产会被冻结，也将面临税务机关的罚款、诉讼，涉及欺诈、造假、逃税的将负严厉的刑事责任。
第三，不仅如此，在资产信息完全透明的情况下，还将承受更重的税务压力。移民帮财税专家提醒：一切建议和规划，一定要以合法合规为前提，这是对我们资产的一个最基本的保护。

posts.title: 沈阳有什么精神分 裂医院好
posts.text:
沈阳有什么精神分 裂医院好【沈阳脑康中医院】『咨询电话：024`·_·`8866`·_·`3333』 地址：辽宁省沈阳市沈河区北三经街皇寺旁(市人大公交站)抑郁症发作以后该怎么办?抑郁症是一种困扰着很多患者的难题，很多抑郁症患者都认为无法摆脱抑郁症的困扰，有很多人都认为抑郁症是不必接受治疗的，殊不知并且严重的抑郁症危害是非常大的，得了抑郁症需要进行治疗，焦虑症发作以后该怎么办?焦虑症发作以后的处理办法主要有以下几点：
一、抑郁症发作以后的处理一定要坦然面对和接受自己的紧张：你应该想到自己的紧张是正常的，很多人在某种情境下可能比你更紧张。不要与这种不安的情绪对抗，而是体验它、接受它。要训练自己像局外人一样观察你害怕的心理，注意不要陷入到里边去，不要让这种情绪完全控制住你。
二、保持良好的心态也是焦虑症发作以后的正确心态：一个人的心态决定了他的人生，只有拥有健康乐观的心态，才可能拥有健康幸福的人生，所以，当我们面对任何挫折时都不可轻言放弃，要坚定信念。注意找机会疏泄压抑的情绪，给自己的心灵解压。
三、抑郁症发作以后需要患者注意要降低对自己的要求：一个人如果十分争强好胜，事事都力求完善，事事都要争先，自然就会经常感觉到时间紧迫。
四、抑郁症发作以后的患者要学会调整节奏，有劳有逸：在日常生活中要注意调整好节奏。工作学习时要思想集中，玩时要痛快。要保证充足的时间，适当安排一些文娱、体育活动，做到有张有弛，劳逸结合。
抑郁症发作以后的处理办法上文已经为大家介绍的非常清楚了，相信通过以上介绍之后，大家现在对“抑郁症发作以后该怎么办”这个问题已经了解的非常清楚了吧。抑郁症不是危及生命的严重疾病，但是抑郁症对患者的影响也是不容小觑的，所以焦虑症患者一定要及时接受科学治疗，尽早摆脱抑郁症才能尽快融入到正常的生活中去。

posts.author: Tel Asiado (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: November 7 Dateline
posts.text:
Famous Birthdays 
1867 - Marie Curie , Physicist and Chemist 
1900 - Heinrich Himmler, Head of the Nazi SS
1905 - William Alwyn, Composer, including film scores  
1913 - Albert Camus, Writer and Philosopher
1918 - Billy Graham, Evangelist
1926 - Dame Joan Sutherland , Australian Soprano, and wife of Conductor Richard Bonynge. 
1943 - Joni Mitchell, Singer and Songwriter

Lefties: 
Marie Curie
Billy Graham

In remembrance of Dame Joan Sutherland, here's her performance, "Sempre libera" from Verdi's opera La Traviata . Magnificent! 


Historical Events 
1861 - The Melbourne Cup, one of the world's most famous horse races, is run for the first time, won by Archer, ridden by J. Cutts. They win again in 1862.

This year, Tuesday, Nov 3, 2015, The Melbourne Cup was won by Michelle Payne, an Australian jockey, riding Prince of Penzance. Payne is the first female jockey to win the event.


1917 - Led by Vladimir Lenin, the Bolshevik revolutionaries with almost no bloodshed in Petrograd, now St. Petersburg, from the provisional Government that came to power after Nicholas II was deposed in March. This is known as the October Revolution, as it falls in October (according to the Julian calendar, used in Russia that time.

1934 - Sergei Rachmaninoff is soloist in his Rhapsody on a Theme of Paganini for piano and orchestra, in its first performance, in Baltimore

1991 - "Magic" Johnson announces he is HIV positive.

1996 -  NASA launches the Mars Global Surveyor. It travels 466 million miles to reach Mars on September 11, 1997. 

2002 - This day, in 2002, 98.97 per cent of Gibraltar residents vote not to share British sovereignty with Spain.

Video Credit:

Joan Sutherland - sempre libera (verdi - la traviata) . YouTube, uploaded by fabiancamposparedes.  Accessed November 7, 2016.  

Resources:

1. Asiado, Tel. The World's Movers and Shapers . New Hampshire: Ore Mountain Publishing House (2005)
2. Chambers Biographical Dictionary , 19th Ed. London: Chambers Harrap, 2011
3. Dateline . Sydney: Millennium House, (2006)
4. Grun, Bernard. The Timetables of History , New 3rd Revised Ed. Simon & Schuster/Touchstone (1991)

thread.title: Chelsea fans react to Andrea Pirlo rumours
thread.title_full: Chelsea fans react to Andrea Pirlo rumours

posts.author: highvelocitysportsnews
posts.title: Chelsea fans react to Andrea Pirlo rumours
posts.text:
Monday was a busy day at Chelsea Football Club. 
In a shock revelation, Chelsea director Michael Emenalo quit the club. 
Emenalo, 52, was the technical director at Chelsea. He celebrated 10 years at the club in October. 
Since he joined the Blues in 2007, Chelsea have scooped up eight major trophies. It’s also true that Chelsea’s academy is now comfortably the most successful in the country. 
Emenalo has played a part in that success through his direct involvement in recruitment. 
Emenalo and Marina Granovskaia have been in charge of Chelsea’s recruitment in recent years. Andrea Pirlo retires 
At the same time over in America, Italian midfield maestro Andrea Pirlo announced his retirement on Monday. 
Pirlo has been a New York City FC player for a couple of years. 
But after NYCFC’s season came to an end, 38-year-old Pirlo has confirmed he’s hung up his boots. 
He made the announcement on social media. 
A post shared by Andrea Pirlo Official (@andreapirlo21) on Nov 6, 2017 at 6:21am PST Chelsea & Andrea Pirlo rumours 
Is it a coincidence that Michael Emenalo left Chelsea on the same day that Andrea Pirlo stopped playing football? 
Over the course of the past year, rumours have popped up linking Pirlo with a possible position at Chelsea. 
Antonio Conte also knows Pirlo well having spent three years together at Juventus. 
It’s previously been claimed that Pirlo could become a coach at Chelsea. 
But maybe he could become the club’s new technical director instead? 
Tweets on Andrea Pirlo possibly joining Chelsea are below. So Emenalo departs Chelsea just as Pirlo retires from playing football. All set for him to move upstairs at Stamford Bridge… 
— Garry Hayes (@garryhayes) November 6, 2017 Pirlo announces his retirement from playing football & then Emenalo leaves his post at Chelsea. 
Coincidence? think not.

posts.author: xuser11954168
posts.title: 不得不提的MPV车型_途睿欧论坛论坛_XCAR
posts.text:
在二胎时代的当今，7座大空间SUV仍是消费者的首选，但不得不提的是， MPV 由于结构原因，在舒适性上较SUV更有优势，所以MPV实则更为适合。给大家盘点新上市或者即将上市的 MPV车型 。
1. 全新 别克GL8
全新一代 GL8 外观设计上沿用了老款GL8的设计风格，其最大的变化在于新车的头部设计采用的是“直瀑+飞翼”式造型，大灯采用的是全LED光源设计，23颗LED不仅照明效果出色，而且也突出了高级感。新车内饰采用了360度环抱式座舱设计，相比现款车型的内饰来看，整体风格与 君越 类似。新车在内饰、中控面板、膝部以上接触区域均采用了软性材质包裹，舒适度大幅提升。
动力方面，别克全新GL8搭载2.0T涡轮增压发动机，最大功率为191千瓦，与之匹配的是一款6速自动变速箱。新车的综合油耗为8.9升/100公里，相比老款车型不但在动力方面有所提升，油耗也下降了不少。
1. 奥德赛
新款奥德赛的外观在集成了家族设计寓言的同时，也将稳重和大气体现的很到位，外观设计也是更偏向于商务。内饰方面设计简洁，层次感强，用料的讲究为内饰整体烘托出精致豪华感。多功能方向盘中控触控屏、触控式空调控制面板等亮点配置，科技感十足动力方面，新车依然搭载一台2.4L地球梦自然吸气发动机，最大功率137kW（186Ps），峰值扭矩为243Nm，传动方面，新车匹配的是一台CVT无级变速箱。
1. G10 PLUS
上汽大通G10 PLUS是采用2+2+3布局，座椅后两排可以前后滑动调节内部空间。主副驾驶座还可电动调节，整个车内最为舒适的自然是第二排的独立座椅，不仅配有可支撑头部两侧的头枕、扶手，还配有腿部支撑，并配有儿童安全座椅接口，可以向后放倒形成近乎平躺的角度。后排座椅也增加了侧翻选装，为多用途车主增加了实用性。上汽大通G10 PLUS共有1.9T 柴油发动机、2.0T以及2.4L的涡轮增压发动机可供选择，提高了一个档次。​

thread.title: 427 lira cam filmi cezasını duyan sanayiye koşuyor
thread.title_full: 427 lira cam filmi cezasını duyan sanayiye koşuyor

posts.title: 427 lira cam filmi cezasını duyan sanayiye koşuyor
posts.text:
Anasayfa > Güncel > 427 lira cam filmi cezasını duyan sanayiye koşuyor 427 lira cam filmi cezasını duyan sanayiye koşuyor Cam filminin yasaklanmasının ardından kullanmaya devam edenlere 206 ile 427 arasında ceza kesileceğini duyan sürücüler Adana'da sanayideki iş yerlerine koştu.  59  18 Tweetle Yorum Yap 
Ceyhun ÖZER/CEYHAN (Adana), (DHA) Trafik cezalarıyla karşı karşıya kalmamak için oto camcılara akın eden araç sahipleri, modeline göre araçlarının camındaki filmleri 50 ile 100 lira arası ücret ödeyerek söktürüyor. Güneş ve ışıktan rahatsız olduğu için 3 ay önce aracına film taktığını belirten 35 yaşındaki Zafer Topal, "Çukurova ve çevre illerde aslında serbest olması lazım, buralar diğer illere göre aşırı sıcak. Aracımdaki filmleri söktürüyorum, bir saat sonra serbest denilse yine taktırırım. Yetkililere buradan sesleniyorum uygulamadan memnun değiliz, 3 ay tak, 5 ay sonra söktür olan vatandaşa oluyor" dedi. Oto cam işi ile uğraşan Mehmet İlengiz ise film yasağının esnafı da mağdur ettiğini söyledi. Filmlerin yasaklanması yerine belli bir koyu renk ölçüsünün olması gerektiğine belirten İlengiz, "Yasağın ardından vatandaşlarımız uzun kuyruklar oluşturarak, cam filmlerini söktürmeye geliyor. Önceden 250-300 lira arası cam filmini takıyorduk, şimdi araçların filmlerini 50-100 lira arasında söküyoruz. Cam filmi takmadığımız için bizim işlerimiz ise durdu" dedi.

thread.section_title: NaNoWriMo Week 1 Updates! – Shay Writes
thread.title: NaNoWriMo Week 1 Updates!
thread.title_full: NaNoWriMo Week 1 Updates!

posts.author: Shay
posts.title: NaNoWriMo Week 1 Updates!
posts.text:
How is NaNo week one over already??? Ah!
I’ve decided to do weekly NaNo updates so yeah. Let’s go.
Project: Pocket Magician a YA fantasy novel (read more about it here )
Word count report: 23,434
How has the week gone? Week 1 has been pretty good for me! I feel like I’m writing slower than usual, trying to get into this novel, but then I look back and yeah, I’ve been making good progress. I’m a fast writer usually so going slow is still pretty fast (again, FOR ME, not everyone works this way). I’m really loving my book and characters so far and having fun with NaNo this month. I’ve finished the first of four parts, so my plot is starting to pick up so I’m excited for that! So yeah, overall, not many complaints!
Snippets:



(I’ve been posting these to my Instagram, if you want to follow me click here! )
A few fun facts about my NaNo novel so far:
My MC (Ry) is a street magician who lives in a fantasy world. He’s very low on the magician’s scale so he’s not permitted to study magic at the university so he does illegal street magic. The main plot is a murder mystery of sorts. One of my main characters (Oliver) is a blind assassin. I have four books planned for this series. (help me) two of my favorite characters have not come into the book yet (Jinx and Luka) but I’m so looking forward to introducing them! My MC is a mix of Hufflepuff and Slytherin. I think he’d be put into Hufflepuff but he definitely has that lurking Slytherin side. Zoe, one of my favorite characters, is a Slytherin through and through as is the princess, Sparrow. While Milo is, regrettably for her, a Gryffindor, and Oliver is a Ravenclaw. Jinx would be… Slytherin and so would Luka but with a side of Gryffindor. He’d be like Harry Potter, likely to either go Slytherin or Gryffindor but in the end he’d probably chose Slytherin for himself. A few songs from my NaNo playlist:
The Arena by Lindsey Stirling (I listened to this on repeat when writing a scene of Ry’s magic, it fits perfectly) King by Lauren Aquilina (I listened to this on repeat while outlining) New Rules by Dua Lipa (if this book were set in our world, Zoe would be playing this song for Ry all the time) Stay With Me by Sam Smith (most the songs on my current playlist have to do with the romance in this book but that’s all I’m saying) WILD by Troye Sivan (I listened to this on repeat to write an adorable scene between Ry and the prince the other day) Tip for the week: If you’re behind on NaNo already DO NOT PANIC. It’s perfectly normal to get behind at some point in the month, it really sucks if it’s right away but, you know, stuff happens. If you fall behind just remember not to panic, it’s possible to win up until the very end. My biggest advice if you fall behind is: don’t force yourself to try to make it up all at once, just write a couple extra hundred words (give or take) a day until you catch back up. You WILL catch back up and it will be FINE. 
How’s your NaNo going??? If you’re not doing NaNo how is your current project coming along? Do let me know in the comments!

posts.text:
Spoiler
7wariot7, on 06 November 2017 - 08:49 PM, said:
Ahoj,rozhodol som sa otvoriť toto vlákno ako "podpich" od supportu a dopredu prosim pripadneho admina aby to tu nezamykal alebo nespájal,ale poposlal názory hračov dalej, nech už budu akekolvek.
k veci:
Chcel by som vedieť aky maťe názor na aktualne velmy časte vysledky bitiek "0:15, 15:0" a zasahy falošneho WG RNG.
bavy vas vyhra kde za 2 minuty rozbijete enemy team.
bavy vas triafať wekaspoty v pohybe lebo RNG vám zapraje?
bavy vas odraziť to čo bez RNG nešlo odraziť,a vy prežijete ajekd ste mali byt "správne" mrtvy ?
schválne sa pýtam na momenty v ktorych ste vyhrali,prebili odrazili , a nie naopak.
Wargaming sa ohána už niekolko patchov ako sa MM vylepšuje,ale stale nič nerobi so schopnostami hráčov,Kde v jednej bitke sa stretne/priklad/ 5 lepšich hračov 5 priemer a 5 slabych VS. 1 lepši 5 priemer a 9 slabych
Alebo lepšia varianta v top tieru 3 silny VS 3 slaby.
Prečo sa nikdy wg ktemu nevyjadry ? chce podla vas WG taketo rychle hry ?
Mna osobne taketo hry nebavia ajked vyhrajeme,a poriadne vytočia ak prehrajeme.
Moj osobny nazor:WG ma čas 28 dni ,to je presny čas, kedy my vyprši premium a ak sa s mm nič nezmeni (dnešna bilancia 20 prehry 3 vyhry) odchádzam z wot.
Aky je názor váš.

thread.title: Diezani bribe: EFCC traces N950m to two ex-govs, detains Idris Wada
thread.title_full: Diezani bribe: EFCC traces N950m to two ex-govs, detains Idris Wada

posts.author: Orimisan Yinka (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Diezani bribe: EFCC traces N950m to two ex-govs, detains Idris Wada
posts.text:
The Economic and Financial Crimes Commission on Monday traced N860m to the immediate past governor of Kogi State, Idris Wada; and a former acting governor of Taraba State, Sani Danladi. 
While N500m was traced to Wada, N450m was traced to Danladi. The money was said to be part of the N23bn allegedly disbursed by a former Minister of Petroleum Resources, Diezani Alison-Madueke, through the then Director of Finance of the Goodluck Jonathan Campaign Organisation, Senator Nenadi Usman. It was learnt that Wada arrived the EFCC office around 12pm and was still in custody around 9pm. The spokesman for the EFCC, Mr. Wilson Uwujaren, confirmed that Wada was detained by the commission. He said, “Yes, he was invited by the EFCC over N500m Diezani money. He is still in our custody.” The Gombe zonal office also quizzed Danladi in respect of the N450m collected by him through Senators Joel Dallami Ikenya and Mark Useni during the build-up to the 2015 presidential election. Danladi, in his statement on oath, told interrogators that he chaired the eight-man committee that disbursed the money for Taraba State. The EFCC stated, “He further stated that, he and the other members of the committee shared N36m among themselves while the balance of N414m was distributed to other stakeholders across the 16 local government areas of the state and one Development Area Council.” Danladi was arrested and detained in Abuja last week and later released on bail to reliable sureties, but asked to report to the EFCC Gombe zonal office for further investigation. Last week, the commission detained a former governor of Benue State, Gabriel Suswam, for his role in the disbursement of the Diezani sleaze. It was learnt that at least 20 former ministers and governors who are members of the PDP may be detained by the commission In the states which were ruled by the PDP, the governors were said to have taken possession of the funds while in states that had no PDP governors, the ministers handled the money. They were alleged to have received a minimum of N450m each. Some of the former governors and ministers that may be picked up soon include  a former Minister of Power, Mohammed Wakil (Borno); and a former Minister of Science and Technology, Alhaji Abdu Bulama (Yobe). Others are former governor Sullivan Chime of Enugu State (now a member of the All Progressives Congress), the immediate past governor of Kebbi State, Saidu Dakin Garin; former governor Ibrahim Shekarau of Kano State, former governor Ali Modu Sheriff of Borno State, former governor James Ngilari of Adamawa State; and a former governor of Zamfara State, Mamuda Shinkafi. Sheriff allegedly received N40m from the N450m said to have been received by a former Minister of Power, Mohammed Wakil. Also, a former deputy governor of Edo State, Chief Lucky Imasuen, and a former Secretary to the State Government of Edo State, Pastor Osagie Ize-Iyamu, may be re-invited for allegedly collecting N700m from the Diezani fund. The source said many of the PDP chieftains had promised to return some of the funds but had failed to do so and therefore had to be invited.

thread.section_title: Bangkokpost.com : Learning
thread.title: Biometric checks for new SIM cards begin Dec 15
thread.title_full: Biometric checks for new SIM cards begin Dec 15

posts.title: Biometric checks for new SIM cards begin Dec 15
posts.text:
A man uses his mobile phone as he is reflected in a mirror in Bangkok on Aug 9, 2017. (Reuters photo) - + The telecom regulator will introduce biometric checks nationwide for mobile telephone users who register their SIM cards from Dec 15 in a bid to stamp out fraudulent electronic transactions. 
Please join us on our Facebook page http://www.facebook.com/bangkokpostlearning Biometric checks for new SIM cards begin Dec 15 
Reuters The telecom regulator will introduce biometric checks nationwide for mobile telephone users who register their SIM cards from Dec 15 in a bid to stamp out fraudulent electronic transactions . The new rules require users to either have their fingerprints verified or their faces scanned. The National Broadcasting and Telecommunications Commission first launched the system in June in the South where a separatist insurgency has persisted for more than a decade , killing more than 6,500 people since 2004. Officials say insurgents in the largely ethnic Malay Muslim provinces of Yala, Pattani and Narathiwat have used pre-paid SIM cards to trigger bombs. Biometric registration in the South was adopted for national security reasons but elsewhere in Thailand it is aimed at mobile banking security , NBTC secretary-general Takorn Tantasith told a news conference on Monday. "This is not aimed at tracking users, but enhancing security , especially in case of mobile payments," said Takorn, the secretary-general of the National Broadcasting and Telecommunications Commission. Similar biometric systems are already in use in Bangladesh, Pakistan and Saudi Arabia. From Dec 15, people will be required to register new SIM cards, both pre-paid and post-paid, at service centres and retailers across the country, which will be equipped with biometric tools, he added. SIM cards for post-paid accounts are now registered on purchase , while pre-paid SIM cards can be bought with no identification . To register a new SIM card, users' fingerprints will be matched against the data stored on their national identification cards, identical to that in the government's central citizen database , Mr Takorn said. Mobile operators will shoulder the cost of card readers, which range from 500 to 9,000 baht, he added. The verification process might alternatively involve facial scans, depending on the equipment available. After verification , service centres will send users' data to mobile operators for record-keeping, without storing any information on-site , Mr Takorn said. Foreigners buying SIM cards in Thailand will have their faces scanned and matched against their passport photographs. Learn from listening 
Click "play" to listen to Biometric checks for new SIM cards begin Dec 15 and "Download" to keep this file for educational purpose.

database : a large amount of information stored in a computer in an organised way - ฐานข้อมูล 
decade : a period of ten years - ทศวรรษ

facial (adj) : connected with a person's face; on a person's face - เกี่ยวกับใบหน้า 
fingerprint : a mark that you leave on something when you touch it, showing the pattern of lines on the skin of your fingers - รอยนิ้วมือ 
fraudulent : dishonest and illegal - ซึ่งฉ้อโกง 
identical : exactly the same, or very similar - เหมือนกัน, แบบเดียวกัน 
identification (noun) : the process of finding out what or who someone is - การหาเอกลักษณ์,การชี้ตัว 
identification card (ID card) : an official card or a document that can prove who you are - บัตรประชาชน

insurgent : someone who belongs to a group of people fighting to take control of their country by force - กลุ่มก่อการกบถ 
launch (verb) : to start something - เริ่มต้น, เปิดโครงการ, เริ่มทำ 
National Broadcasting and Telecommunications Commission (NBTC) : the independent government agency which oversees and regulates the Thai telecoms and broadcasting industry - สำนักงานคณะกรรมการกิจการกระจายเสียง กิจการโทรทัศน์และกิจการโทรคมนาคมแห่งชาติ

nationwide : throughout a whole country - ทั่วทั้งประเทศ

on-site : at a particular place - 
persist : to continue - ยืดเยื้อต่อไป 
process : a series of actions that you take in order to achieve a result - แนวทางปฏิบัติ, กระบวน, วิธีการ 
purchase : the process of buying something - การซื้อ 
register : to put your name and other information on an official list in order to be allowed to do something, e.g., vote, study, stay in a hotel etc - ลงทะเบียน 
registration : the process of recording names or information on an official list - การขึ้นทะเบียน, การลงทะเบียน 
regulator : an official (or organisation) who makes certain that the companies who operate a system work effectively and fairly - ผู้มีอำนาจควบคุม 
retailer : a person or company that sells goods directly to the public for their own use - ผู้ขายปลีก 
secretary-general (noun) : the person who is in charge of the department that deals with the running of a large international or political organisation - เลขาธิการ, เลขาธิการใหญ่ 
security : protection; safety from attack, harm, or damage - ความมั่นคง, ระบบรักษาความปลอดภั, ความปลอดภัย 
separatist : of a group of people who are trying to gain independence for the area they live in - ผู้สนับสนุนการแบ่งแยก 
shoulder : to deal with or accept something difficult - แบกรับภาระ หรือสถานการณ์ 
stamp out : to end something bad or unpleasant by taking strong action - ยุติ, ดับ 
telecom : a business in the telecommunications industry - โทรคมนาคม) 
track (verb) : to try to follow and find someone or something - ตามรอย 
transactions (noun) : the action or process of buying or selling things - การค้า, การติดต่อทางธุรกิจ 
trigger : to cause - ก่อให้เกิด กระตุ้น 
verification : the process of checking that something is true or accurate - การพิสูจน์ความจริง, การตรวจสอบความเป็นจริง 
verified : checked to make sure that something is true or accurate - การพิสูจน์ความจริง, การตรวจสอบความเป็นจริง RECOMMENDED STORIES

posts.text: Tết Cập nhật ngay sau khi có kết quả ⋅ 7 tháng 11, 2017 TIN TỨC Chạy đua bán hàng lưu động trong '1 tỉ khởi nghiệp cùng Saigon Co.op' Báo Thanh Niên Nhưng… "chưa đến 30 chưa phải tết " khi giám khảo khách mời là NSƯT Quế Trân trao cho mỗi đội một thử thách cam go: phải bán hết 40 can nước ... Gắn cờ là không liên quan Á hậu du lịch hoàn vũ thế giới diện váy trắng khoe vẻ đẹp mong manh Pháp Luật Plus ... Linh, danh hài Tấn Beo, diễn viên Thân Thuý Hà, diễn viên Hứa Minh Đạt, Bạch Công Khanh, Xuân Nghị, Lê Lộc,…sẽ công chiếu dịp Tết 2018 này. thread.title: [2017 사회조사] 성인 3분의 1 "노후준비 안 한다"(통계청)
thread.title_full: [2017 사회조사] 성인 3분의 1 "노후준비 안 한다"(통계청) : 네이버 블로그

posts.author: 현명한 투자자
posts.title: [2017 사회조사] 성인 3분의 1 "노후준비 안 한다"(통계청)
posts.text:
[2017 사회조사] 성인 3분의 1 "노후준비 안 한다" 기사입력 2017-11-07 노인[연합뉴스TV 제공]
고령자 10명 중 7명 "스스로 생활비 마련"
집 근처 장애인 관련 시설 '설립 반대' 국민 늘었다
(세종=연합뉴스) 박대한 기자 = 19세 이상 성인 인구 중 3분의1 가량은 아무런 노후 준비를 하지 않고 있는 것으로 나타났다. 노후 준비를 하고 있더라도 국민연금에만 의존하는 경우가 많았다.
60세 이상 고령자 10명 중 7명은 본인 및 배우자가 생활비를 직접 마련했고, 현재 자녀와 따로 살고 있으면서 향후에도 따로 살고 싶어하는 것으로 나타났다.
국민 10명 중 8명 이상은 집 근처에 장애인 관련 시설을 설치해도 반대하지 않는다는 입장으로 집계됐다. 다만 반대한다는 의견은 2년 전에 비해 높아졌다.
통계청은 7일 이같은 내용을 담은 '2017년 사회조사' 결과를 발표했다.
통계청은 전국 2만5천704 표본가구 내 상주하는 만 13세 이상 가구원 약 3만9천명을 대상으로 지난 5∼6월 조사를 진행했다.
◇ 성인 10명 중 6명 "건강보험·국민보험 부담된다"
우리 사회 전반적인 생활여건을 3년 전과 비교했을 때 국민의 41.1%는 '좋아졌다'고 응답했고, '변화없음' 45.8%, '나빠짐' 13% 등이었다.
'좋아졌다'는 응답비율은 2015년(38.8%) 대비 2.3%포인트(p) 상승했다.
향후 필요하거나 늘려야 한다고 생각하는 공공시설은 보건의료시설(24.1%), 사회복지시설(18.3%), 국·공립 어린이집 및 유치원(17.5%) 등의 순이었다.
특히 30대는 국·공립 어린이집 및 유치원 시설을 확충해야 한다는 의견이 37.3%로 가장 많았고, 40대 이상은 보건의료시설을 꼽은 이들이 다수였다.
매달 사회보험료를 납부하는 사람 중 61.7%는 건강보험이 부담된다고 답변했다. 국민연금은 59.3%, 고용보험은 36.5%로 나타났다.
◇ 성인 34.6% "노후준비 안한다"
19세 이상 인구 중 노후 준비를 하고 있지 않다는 이가 전체의 34.6%였다. 노후 준비를 하고 있지 않은 이유는 '준비할 능력 없음'이 39.1%였고, '앞으로 준비할 계획'(33.3%), '아직 생각 안함'(17.8%) 등의 순이었다.
노후 준비를 하고 있다고 응답한 이들 중 53.3%는 국민연금을 주된 방법이라고 밝혔다.
[그래픽] 성인 1/3 노후준비 안 하고 20대 소비 만족도 가장 높아
노후를 위한 사회적 관심사는 소득지원(38.9%), 요양보호 서비스(28.5%), 취업지원(22.3%) 등으로 나타났다.
노후를 보내고 싶은 방법으로는 절반이 넘는 58.6%가 취미활동을 꼽았고, 소득창출 활동(17.3%), 학습 및 자아개발활동(9.5%) 등으로 집계됐다.
60세 이상 고령자의 생활비 마련 방법은 본인과 배우자 부담이 69.9%에 달했고, 자녀 또는 친척 지원(20.2%), 정부 및 사회단체(9.9%) 등의 순이었다.
본인과 배우자나 정부와 사회단체가 지원하는 경우는 늘어나고 있지만 자녀나 친척이 지원하는 경우는 감소하고 있다.
본인과 배우자가 생활비를 마련하는 경우 일해서 버는 근로소득 및 사업소득(54.2%)으로 충당하는 경우가 가장 많았다.
고령자 69.4%는 현재 자녀와 따로 살고 있었고, 77.8%는 향후에도 자녀와 '같이 살고 싶지 않다'고 응답했다.
선호하는 장례방법은 화장 후 봉안(납골당, 납골묘)이 44.2%였고, 화장 후 자연장(수목장, 잔디장 등)이 43.6%, 매장(묘지)이 10.9%였다.
◇ '집근처 장애인 시설 반대 안한다' 92.9→85.5%
국민 85.5%는 집 근처에 장애인 생활시설이나 재활시설 등이 설립되는 것에 대해 '반대하지 않는다'는 입장을 나타냈다. 여전히 높지만 2년 전(92.9%)에 비해서는 7.4%포인트(p) 낮아졌다.
40대 이상은 연령이 높아질수록 장애인 관련 시설 설립 반대 의견도 높아지는 경향을 보였다.
국민 5명 중 1명인 21.4%는 장애인과 직접 만나거나 온라인상으로 안부를 주고받는 등 지속적인 관계를 유지하는 것으로 나타났다.
장애인을 위한 각종 복지사업에 대해 '재원이 허락한다면 확대해야 한다'는 의견이 49.4%로 가장 많았다. '충분하다'는 응답은 8.2%에 그쳤다.
향후 정부에서 우선적으로 확대해야 할 장애인 복지사업은 의료 및 재활지원 서비스(25.8%), 일자리 및 자립자금 지원 서비스(20.5%)를 꼽은 이들이 많았다.
pdhis959@yna.co.kr
